bug.author: gpang
bug.summary: Incorrect state change lock may cause inconsistent backups
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 1.8 and master Describe the bug Backups may be inconsistent, while RPCs are in-progress when the backup is started. To Reproduce Have many RPCs in progress, and start the backup. Expected behavior The backup is taken with the exclusive lock on the state of the system, without in-progress RPCs running. Urgency Critical for consistent backups. Additional context This is caused by the state change lock not being held for the duration of the RPC.
